Title: HTML Injection in preact
Description: Versions of `preact` on prerelease tags alpha and beta are vulnerable to HTML Injection. Due to insufficient input validation the package allows attackers to inject JavaScript objects as virtual-dom nodes, which may lead to Cross-Site Scripting. This requires user input parsed with `JSON.parse()` to be passed directly into JSX without sanitization. Upgrade to .
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 10.0.0-alpha.0 up to 10.0.0-beta.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 10.0.0-alpha.0, all versions after 10.0.0-beta.0
Solution: Upgrade to version 10.0.0-beta.1 or above. *Note*: 10.0.0-beta.1 may be an unstable version. Use caution.
